card_text: Special Summon 1 "Familiar of the Evil Eye Token" (Fiend/DARK/Level 1/ATK 400/DEF 400), or, if "Evil Eye of Selene" is in your Spell & Trap Zone, you can Special Summon 2 instead, also for the rest of this turn after this card resolves, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except Fiend monsters. You can banish this card from your GY; your opponent cannot target "Evil Eye" Spells/Traps you control with card effects this turn. You can only use each effect of "Evil Eye Reemergence" once per turn.
